feels.name: Disapproval
feels.quote: But, my dear Chettam, why should I use my influence to Casaubon’s disadvantage, unless I were much surer than I am that I should be acting for the advantage of Miss Brooke? I know no harm of Casaubon.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: Clearly, there would be no interference with Miss Brooke’s marriage through Mr. Cadwallader; and Sir James felt with some sadness that she was to have perfect liberty of misjudgment.

feels.name: Pride
feels.quote: Doubtless this persistence was the best course for his own dignity: but pride only helps us to be generous; it never makes us so, any more than vanity makes us witty.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: He was gradually discovering the delight there is in frank kindness and companionship between a man and a woman who have no passion to hide or confess.

Places.name: Rectory_study
Places.description: A room where the Rector and Sir James Chettam have a conversation.

Places.name: Dorothea_s_home
Places.description: The future home of Dorothea where she dictates changes.
